Test Name: Methylmalonic Aciduria-Propionic Aciduria Combined Gene Panel
Specimen Type: Peripheral blood, buccal swab, or saliva
Purpose: To detect and analyze genetic variants associated with Methylmalonic Aciduria and Propionic Aciduria.
Container: EDTA tube (blood), sterile buccal swab in DNA stabilizing solution, or saliva collection tube
Equipment: Real-Time PCR system, thermocycler, microcentrifuge, vortex mixer, pipettes with filter tips, PCR plates/tubes and seals, laboratory freezer/refrigerator, DNA sequencer
